Generation V.Black: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
Generation V.White: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.
Generation V.Black 2: Storing energy for evolution, it sits. But, when predators approach, it moves to stab them with poison spikes.
Generation V.White 2: Storing energy for evolution, it sits. But, when predators approach, it moves to stab them with poison spikes.

Generation VI.X: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
Generation VI.Y: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph .
Generation VIII.Shield: Whirlipede protects itself with a sturdy shell and poisonous spikes while it stores up the energy it'll need for evolution.
